content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Customer’s Story\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":205135,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/65542f5a-e1b8-4bb1-a482-4833f66d03e9/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/65542f5a-e1b8-4bb1-a482-4833f66d03e9/3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"3.PNG\",\"name\":\"3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"65542f5a-e1b8-4bb1-a482-4833f66d03e9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":867,\"height\":148},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Bose Corporation is an American problem-solving company that was founded in 1964 by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.nytimes.com/2013/07/13/business/amar-g-bose-acoustic-engineer-and-inventor-dies-at-83.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dr. Amar Bose\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", a professor of electrical engineering at Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), who died in 2013 at the age of 83. Dr. Bose invented a speaker system that was able to closely recreate the essence and experience of a live concert. That’s when Bose started to change the way people listen. Over the course of his extraordinary life, Dr. Amar Bose was a scientist, inventor, professor, and entrepreneur. And shortly before his death, he gave the majority of the stock of Bose Corporation to MIT in an act of extraordinary generosity and importance. We invite you to watch THE GIFT  — a short film which reveals this story:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9kIPvDYPJ1Y\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The majority owner of Bose Corporation is the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, which receives cash dividends through the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-voting_stock\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"non-voting shares\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" donated by the founder in 2011. Today the company remains driven by its founding principles, investing in long-term research with one fundamental goal: to develop new technologies with real customer benefits. They are manufacturing speakers. Bose has products for the home, the car, on the go, and in public spaces. There were some org changes that entailed turnovers and resulted in chaos. Now they are struggling with competitors.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"According to the company annual report in the 2019 financial year, Bose Corporation received revenue of US$3.8 billion and employed more than 9,000 people (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://assets.bose.com/content/dam/Bose_DAM/Web/consumer_electronics/global/content_pages/corporate/about_us/sustainability/Sustainability-2019-refresh/pdf/Bose-2019-Sustainability-Report.pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"see details\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\")\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.bose.com/en_us/index.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bose website\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.youtube.com/user/Bose/featured\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bose YouTube channel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
